TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SecurityPolicySection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class SecurityPolicySection Inherits ConfigurationSection

Docs.summary: 定義用來支援 Web 應用程式安全性基礎結構的組態設定。 此類別無法被繼承。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SecurityPolicySection>類別提供一個方式來以程式設計方式存取和修改的內容`securityPolicy`組態檔區段。
## Examples 此範例示範如何以宣告方式在指定值`securityPolicy`區段中，也可存取隸屬<xref:System.Web.Configuration.SecurityPolicySection>類別。
下列組態檔範例示範如何以宣告方式為指定的值`securityPolicy`一節。
``` <system.web> <securityPolicy> <trustLevel name="Full" policyFile="internal" /> <trustLevel name="High" policyFile="web_hightrust.config" /> <trustLevel name="Medium" policyFile="web_mediumtrust.config" /> <trustLevel name="Low" policyFile="web_lowtrust.config" /> <trustLevel name="Minimal" policyFile="web_minimaltrust.config" /> </securityPolicy> </system.web> ```
下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.Configuration.SecurityPolicySection>類別。
[!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SecurityPolicySection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SecurityPolicySection/CS/securitypolicysection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SecurityPolicySection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SecurityPolicySection/VB/securitypolicysection.vb#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: 使用預設設定初始化 類別的新執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SecurityPolicySection.%23ctor%2A>建構函式不是直接從您的程式碼使用。 它會呼叫 ASP.NET 組態系統。 取得的執行個體<xref:System.Web.Configuration.SecurityPolicySection>類別使用<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A>方法。

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Properties As ConfigurationPropertyCollection

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TrustLevels As TrustLevelCollection

remarks.format:
## Remarks 預設值<xref:System.Web.Configuration.SecurityPolicySection.TrustLevels%2A>屬性是`Full`， `High`， `Medium`， `Low`，和`Minimal`。 項目<xref:System.Web.Configuration.SecurityPolicySection.TrustLevels%2A>集合，每個指定的安全性層級名稱與相關聯的原則檔。 您可以藉由提供您自己具名的信任層級項目對應至指定的檔案擴充安全性系統`policyFile`屬性。 如需建立信任層級元素的資訊，請參閱[（ASP.NET 設定結構描述） securityPolicy 的 trustLevel 項目](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/729ab04c-03da-4ee5-86b1-be9d08a09369)。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.Configuration.SecurityPolicySection.TrustLevels%2A>屬性，將信任層級項目新增至組態檔，並更新組態檔。 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.Configuration.SecurityPolicySection>類別。
[!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SecurityPolicySection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SecurityPolicySection/CS/securitypolicysection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SecurityPolicySection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SecurityPolicySection/VB/securitypolicysection.vb#2)]
